title: Squash â€” Powdery mildew
description: White powdery patches on leaves and stems common in warm, dry days with high humidity at night; apply potassium bicarbonate or remove infected tissue.

treatment.chemical: Apply sulfur or potassium bicarbonate at first sign of disease and repeat every 7-10 days.
treatment.organic: Remove infected leaves, improve air circulation, use neem oil, or apply potassium bicarbonate.
